transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Hello, hi good morning ma'am. Actually, mere ko na aap se aapke catalog ke discussion karna tha. Aapka catalog ka score 34.7 hai, toh ki matlab bahut bare minimum hai. Minimum 75% company ka requirement hota hai, taki aapki company promote ho. Toh thoda 10-15 minute nikal sakte ho aap abhi?
Customer: Actually, main, hamare jo sir hai na, woh out of station hai sir. Haan ji. Aur jab tak woh aayenge nahi, tab tak bina discussion ka main catalog ke bare kuch bata nahi paungi.
Executive: Nahi nahi, catalog mein like se kuch add nahi karna. Jo products added hai na, jo aapne mujhse add karwaye the, usme hi details fill karni hai. Unki details missing hai.
Customer: Ji ji, toh uske liye mujhe bhi kuch kuch details leni hai. Maine aapko bataya tha na sir. Aur abhi actually mein sir out of station hai. Toh maybe ho sakta hai kal ya parso mein aayenge Ranchi. Okay. Unse meri baat hogi uske baad hi bata paungi. Kyunki mere ko bhi koi idea nahi hai na abhi.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Isi liye ab main aise kuch bhi bata nahi paungi sir.
Executive: Okay, okay. Accha theek hai. Baki mere ko ye batao ki jo aapka recent ka jo buyleads ka consumption hai, uska kya feedback hai aapka?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Kya bol rahe hai sir?
Executive: Main keh raha hu ki jo aapne recently buyleads vagera consume kari hai na, toh unka feedback kya hai?
Customer: Feedback toh vahi hai sir ki abhi leads vagera mein abhi zyada consume kar nahi rahe ho aap? Leads vagera abhi hum log unko diye nahi hai na. Abhi toh bas main unse baat karke janne ka koshish kar rahi hu ki kya unki requirement hoti hai, kya se kya hai. Kyunki abhi hamara proper is field mein ek tarikh se work hoga. Haan ji. Ji. Toh sir out of station hai toh isiliye abhi isme abhi hum log proper abhi dhyan nahi de paye hai. Hmm hmm hmm. Abhi sir aate hai, fir sara details main unse lungi, uske baad fir main is field mein thoda work karungi.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh isme na mere ko aapko ek cheez guide karni thi. Jaise aap leads consume kar rahe ho na, toh aap jo hai matlab leads kaafi kar rahe ho leads consume karne mein. Abhi tak matlab aapne bhale hi check karne ke liye kari hai, but isko habit bana lo ki aapna jo 4 ghante se pehle pehle wali leads hai unko consume karo.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai? Um agar aap matlab zero jo zero se 4 ghante wali leads hoti hai, usme conversion ke zyada chances hote hai. Because woh fresh lead hoti hai. Zyada sellers ne unse contact kara nahi hua hota.
Executive: Theek hai? Teesra ye ki jaise aapka kisi se baat vagera, abhi tak jis se bhi aapne baat vagera kari hai na, toh unse na feedback le liya karo, rating and reviews apni profile pe.
Customer: Sun rahe ho ma'am aap meri baat?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Haan ji, main keh raha hu ki rating and reviews le liya karo jinse bhi aapka like normal baat bhi hota hai na. Aapki profile mein thodi bahut rating rahegi toh aapke paas inquiries ka flow accha aayega. Because inquiries mostly jo log hote hai, profile ka rating vagera dekh ke hi karte hai. Jo calls aati hai aapke paas ya direct messages aate hai, ye sab cheeze.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Baki, haan ji, baki ek baar mere ko ye bata do ki main aapko connect kab karu fir catalog abhi main, main pehle sir se baat karungi fir main khud aapko connect karungi sir.
Executive: Okay. Ya toh ek kaam kar sakte ho aap. Ki apne, apne jaise aap sir se vagera baat vagera karoge na products ka, toh ya toh apne end se aap product ki details daal dena. Matlab specifications daalni hai bas. Pata aapko kaise daalni hai?
Customer: Woh toh ma'am ne bataya hai. Lekin pehle main details toh le lu sir. Uske baad main aap se connect karungi na, toh aap ek baar deeply bata dijiyega.
Executive: Accha sir. Theek hai. Theek hai. Main thoda sa ek do din wait kijiye.
Executive: Sure, sure ma'am, no worries. Just ek minute ruk jao. Main ek cheez check karu last aapke profile pe.
Executive: Ma'am aapki jo theek hai. Mere ko ek baat batao ji aap kya hota hai stock production mein aapko deal nahi karna na vaise. Aapke sir ne hi hatwaye the ye. Iron waste scrap. Jo scrap wale products hai.
Customer: Kya bol rahe ho sir?
Executive: Main keh raha hu ki jo aapke scrap wale products hai na, jo aapke sir ne hataye the, toh inko matlab out of stock hi rehne dena hai na? Fir main inki categories hata dunga.
Customer: Out of stock hi rehne dijiye.
Executive: Okay, alright. Thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Nahi pata aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discuss catalog details.

- Unable to provide catalog details currently.

- Wants to know feedback on buylead consumption.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to connect later for catalog details.

- Executive guided on consuming leads effectively.

- Executive suggested taking ratings and reviews.

- Executive confirmed scrap products to be out of stock.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect after discussing with her superior.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, buyleads, rating, reviews, products
